class_notes:
This course will be delivered in a hybrid format. Students will attend class in-person on Mondays and virtually on Wednesdays.


The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the Emory College Liberal Arts and Sciences program.
